lead_paragraph: PETZKO--Joseph Sr.,Age 92, of Boynton Beach, FL, formerly of New Jersey, passed away on July 17, 2016. He was born in Clymer, PA on March 21, 1924. He entered into the Army after high school and served in India and Berma 1942-1945. He married Carmella in 1946, and they had one son Joseph Jr., and two daughters Patricia Ann and Carmel Ann. After Carmella's passing in 1993, Joe met and married Beatrice in 1996. She passed in 2015. Joseph worked for The New York Times from 1951 until retiring in 1986. He was very active in church choirs throughout his life, following in his father's footsteps, a choir director and cantor at St. Michael's in Dunmore, PA. Joseph is survived by his children, grandchildren, great-grandchildren and great-great-grandson, nieces, nephews and friends. Donations in Joe's honor to Hospice of Palm Beach, FL. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PETZKO, JOSEPH SR.
